original_text: They will be very afraid. Their bodies will hurt with great pain, like a woman who is giving birth. They will look at each other, as their faces show fear and pain.
korean_text: 그들이 놀라며 괴로움과 슬픔에 사로잡혀 해산이 임박한 여자 같이 고통하며 서로 보고 놀라며 얼굴이 불꽃 같으리로다

sentences.original_text: Their bodies will hurt with great pain,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 몸은 큰 고통으로 아플 것이다,

sentences.original_text: like a woman who is giving birth.
They will look at each other,
as their faces show fear and pain.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 얼굴이 두려움과 고통을 나타낼 것이다.
